key_visual_elements: An old, haggard woman with iron teeth and a hooked nose
Wild, tangled hair and glowing eyes
A hut on chicken legs in a dark, enchanted forest
A mortar and pestle for flying, and a broom to sweep away tracks
description: Baba Yaga, the legendary witch of Slavic folklore, depicted as a fearsome old woman with supernatural power, surrounded by the magical and ominous elements of her myth.
